SliderProps.name: disabled
SliderProps.description: Whether or not to put the slider into a disabled state.

SliderProps.name: max
SliderProps.description: The maximum value of the slider (right side)

SliderProps.name: min
SliderProps.description: The minimum value of the slider (left side)

SliderProps.name: showLabel
SliderProps.description: Whether or not to show value labels below the slider increments.

SliderProps.name: step
SliderProps.description: The distance between each stopping point on the Slider.

SliderProps.name: value
SliderProps.description:
The currently set value of the Slider.
Defaults to the middle between min and max.
